Property description- hotel is 100pct non smoking. The contemporary hilton reading hotel offers a warm and inviting atmosphere just a 4 minute drive from reading*s historical city center the river thames and the famous shopping center the oracle. The hotel is situated on the kennett island development just off of the a33 and is within walking distance of the green park and the madejski stadium. Reading train station is only 3 minutes drive away and heathrow airport is a 25 minute drive from the hilton reading hotel. All of the spacious air-conditioned guest rooms and suites at the hilton reading hotel have been tastefully decorated and feature wired and wireless internet access the latest in audio-visual technology a large ergonomic desk and comfortable serenity beds. Dine in the stylish larder restaurant which offers a combination of local and international dishes with both traditional and contemporary influences. Finish your meal with an expertly mixed cocktail in the relaxing atmosphere of bar k which also serves light snacks and meals throughout the day. Tone up in the complimentary livingwell health club and enjoy 24-hour access to the hilton fitness by precor gym a heated indoor swimming pool sauna steam room and a dance studio for a variety of fitness classes. Relax unwind and enjoy a beauty treatment or massage with the escape spa. Celebrate or hold a unique business function at the hilton reading hotel which features 8 flexible meeting rooms and a large full accessible ballroom catering for up to 400 guests and offering built in audio-visual screens and full wired and wireless internet connectivity. Paragraph.Text:
Five minutes from the M3, the Hilton Bracknell hotel has just undergone a Â£1m refurbishment. Revive yourself in the LivingWell Health Club with gym, pool or beauty treatment rooms. Relax in the Jacuzzi and sauna or do business in one of 12 meeting rooms for up to 250, with wireless internet access in the lounge and Bar. The hotel is 30 minutes' drive from Heathrow.
Enjoy coffees or smoothies in the Lounge Bar, a roast dinner from The Larder Restaurant's carvery and 24-hour drinks in the Hilton Bracknell hotel's Bar. All Hilton Bracknell hotel rooms have high-speed internet access. Step up to a Deluxe Room for a marble bathroom.
Stay at the Hilton Bracknell hotel and unwind in the heated indoor pool or Jacuzzi, pamper yourself in the beauty treatment rooms and work out in the gym. Visit Bracknell attractions such as Coral Reef Water World or go further afield to Windsor Castle, Ascot Racecourse and the rides at Thorpe Park. - Lhr-heathrow airport.............23.0 MI-37.0 KM - lgw-gatwick airport..............44.0 MI-70.8 KM - downtown ........................2.0 MI-3.2 KM . Property description- this hotel is 100 % non smoking five minutes from the m3 the hilton bracknell hotel is just a 30 minute drive from heathrow airport. Revive yourself in the livingwell health club with gym pool or beauty treatment rooms. Relax in the bubble pool and sauna or do business in one of 11 meeting rooms for up to 250 with wireless internet access in the lounge and bar. Relax in the modern lounge and bar area at the hilton bracknell hotel while enjoying a coffee or a drink or dine in the larder restaurant and savor traditional english cuisine. Test your skills in planet h our interactive games rooms great for both children and the young at heart. Wifi is available in the lounge and bar while all bedrooms have wired high-speed internet access. Visit bracknell attractions such as coral reef water world or go further afield to windsor castle ascot racecourse legoland and the rides at thorpe park. - Lhr-heathrow airport.............2.0 MI-3.2 KM - lgw-gatwick airport..............45.0 MI-72.4 KM - ltn-luton airport................37.0 MI-59.5 KM - downtown ........................2.3 MI-3.7 KM . Property description- ramada heathrow is the new dt by hilton london heathrow airport. This hotel is 100pct non-smoking the doubletree by hilton london heathrow airport hotel is conveniently located a stone*s throw from london*s busy heathrow and is just 1.2 miles from hounslow west tube station. Our full service hotel offers complimentary wi-fi in the lobby area and has an on-site restaurant and 24-hour bar open for residents. This heathrow airport hotel boasts a stylish open plan reception and dining area along with comfortable and modern guest rooms. Relax in our contemporary bar whilst using the free wifi and chose from our extensive arts brasserie menu in our restaurant. With wines from around the world and a range of delicious meals to choose from there*s plenty to suite everyone. Deluxe rooms are available for extra luxury and are suited to the business traveler or great to treat that special someone. All guest rooms benefit from crabtree - evelyn toiletries and high speed internet access. The doubletree london heathrow airport hotel has 5 meeting rooms suitable for all your business needs from training and presentations to exhibitions and interviews. All rooms have natural day light and air conditioning audio visual equipment and a maximum capacity of 70 people. Our professional staff are at hand throughout the day to ensure your event runs smoothly. The hotel is close to many corporate offices such as tcc nats british airways ibm and hitachi. We are also conveniently located for family attractions such as thorpe park and legoland. Just 45 minutes into central london discover the london eye the natural history museum or catch a show at the west end. Whatever your reason for staying at the doubletree london heathrow airport you won*t be disappointed with our courteous and friendly staff and our signature warm doubletree chocolate chip cookie to welcome you to the hotel. Planes, trains and automobiles... The Premier Inn Hotel Hayes Heathrow is the ideal travel hub. From here, you're well placed to jet off to business and leisure destinations in Greater London - and just about anywhere else in the world. Hop on a train for the bright lights and sights of the city. Cheer on your team at Twickenham Stadium. Or catch the main event at Wembley Arena. Then settle down for a tasty meal in our restaurant and a great night's sleep in your extra-comfy bed. Paragraph.Text:
Village Farnborough is one of the unique landmark Black Box designs led by a new generation of Village Urban Resorts. Each room at this modern - sleek and stylish hotel is contemporary in design and extremely comfortable and comes equipped with a super-comfy Sealy bed - ultra modern en-suite - flat screen TV - in-room climate control - hospitality tray and free wi-fi throughout.
As a guest you get totally unrestricted access to all of our leisure club facilities at Velocity Health and Fitness. For those looking to feel the burn we have the latest state-of-the-art gym equipment and a 20m heated indoor swimming pool for swimmers after some serious lengths. You will find saunas - whirlpool spa and a steam room to relax and unwind from the hustle and bustle of modern life.
When it comes to dining Village Farnborough has a variety of options to suit all tastes and budgets. Guests can enjoy open theatre dining at Victory Chop and Ale House serving tasty steaks - great seafood and ales. Of course - you need a great wine list to complement our great food and we have everything from the easy drinking to the rich and complex. If it is hearty pub grub - a great pint and live sports you are after - you will find a Victory Pub and Kitchen in every Village Urban Resort. We do great deals too. Every week - we run specials not on the menu or exclusive events. The hotel has an on-site Starbucks Coffee Shop offering a great selection of drinks and snacks in relaxed surroundings and a great place to catch up with friends and family.
Enjoy the wonderful amenities and great service at the Village Urban Resort Farnborough. -Url:www.Village-hotels.Co.Uk . - Fab-farnborough airport . . . .2.0 MI- 3.2 KM - lhr-heathrow airport . . . . . 26.0 MI- 41.8 KM - sou-eastleigh . . . . . . . . .46.0 MI- 74.0 KM - downtown ......................0.3 MI- 0.4 KM -property description- village urban resorts are ideally placed modern hotels in every big city across the uk and are easily accessible by air - rail and all major road networks. They offer both the business and leisure traveller everything under one roof - uber chic and stylish bedrooms - dedicated meeting and conference facilities - state of the art health and fitness - a fantastic choice of dining - a real pub - an onsite starbucks - complimentary wi-fi throughout the hotel and free parking. Attractions - ascot . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 12.0 MI-19.KM 3 - bird world . . . . . . . . . . . .10.0 MI-16.KM 1 - buckingham palace . . . . . . . . 38.0 MI-61.KM 2 - didcot railway centre . . . . . . 5.0 MI-8.0km - legoland . . . . . . . . . . . . .17.0 MI-27.KM 4 - london eye . . . . . . . . . . . .38.0 MI-61.KM 2 - thorpe park . . . . . . . . . . . 20.0 MI-32.KM 2 - uffington castle . . . . . . . . .9.0 MI-14.KM 5 - vale and downland museum . . . . .4.0 MI-6.4km - windsor castle . . . . . . . . . .19.0 MI-30.KM 6 location description you will always find village urban resorts easy to get to. They are well placed for the motorway network and regional airports and close to major towns and cities located just off the m3 motorway and only 1 mile from farnborough airport and rail station. Village farnborough is just 38 minutes to london waterloo by train close and to the m25 and m4. . There are many areas of interest surrounding village farnborough if you are after culture arts or some history and local sightseeing. Embrace the culture at windsor castle - shop till you drop at kingsmead and keep active at legoland. Other local cities and attractions nearby include bird world - thorpe park - ascot - the london eye and buckingham palace. -24 hour security -alarms monitored -audible alarms -smoke alarms in halls -smoke alarms in rooms -smoke alarms public areas -smoke alarm hard wired -basic medical equipment -dead bolts -electronic keycards -backup generators -emergency evac plan -emergency info in rooms -emergency lighting -exit maps in rooms -exit signs lit -hallway fire detectors -public fire detectors -room fire detectors -fire extinguishers in halls -first aid available -secondary locks -rooms have viewports -self closing doors -multiple exits per floor -parking areas lit -patrolled parking areas -safety compliant -room windows open -staff trained to dup keys -staff first aid trained -ventilated stairwells -cctv in entrance -video of parking areas -recorded vid surveillance-cctv in public areas -well lit walkways -grabbars -rmaccesswheel -rollinshower -raisedtoiletseat -accessiblebaths -adaptedbathrooms -accessiblelightswitch -accessibleelevators - braillelargeprintliteratur e -wideentrance -widecorridors -widerestaurantentrance -accessiblewashbasins No service charges Tax included Ex 10.00gbp ra-rc cr

Paragraph.Text: Jetting off or flying in? Wherever you're heading, you'll find Premier Inn Hotel Heathrow Bath Road a handy launch pad. And with great transport links and the Heathrow Express Rail just minutes away, you'll be well placed for business and leisure destinations throughout London too. If you've time to stop and explore, plan a big adventure at Legoland. Cheer on your team at Twickenham Stadium. Or head for high-adrenalin thrills and spills at Thorpe Park. Then come back to earth at our tasty restaurant, and unwind in your spacious room and extra-comfy bed.
